attributes.action: Provide funding for ALL children using school transport to catchment schools
attributes.additional_details:
Our closest secondary school is new, prior to this village was entitled to subsidised school bus' now there is no support. The school we have chosen is our other catchment school. 
S/Bus will cost £900pp pa. Cost of living has made this payment unaffordable. There is no support for 'middle earners' to their catchment schools. A household income of £40k in LDN is not enough to live off, when mortgage payments are £0000s, childcare, etc, yet receive no support. Make school transport more inclusive
attributes.background: School transport is unavoidable for most families. Funding for school transport is currently inadequate. Only a very small % of families qualify and only covers their 'closest school' it ignores other catchment schools and has no consideration for the individual pupils needs/wants from their school.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619430
